subject: Re: [junit] junit and ant
msgSnippet: Hi Veena, The  .class file is not placed at the location dir= ${test} mentioned in    <fileset dir= ${test} includes= **/*Test.class /> Take care that
messageBody:
Hi Veena,


The .class file is not placed at the location dir="${test}" mentioned in <fileset dir="${test}" includes="**/*Test.class"/>


Take care that they are at specified path.


regards,


Ravi




junit@yahoogroups.com wrote:

Hi,

please look at my code

package test;
import junit.framework.TestCase;
public class GopalTest extends TestCase
{
public GopalTest (String name)
{
super(name);
}
public void testSomething()
{
assertTrue(8 == (4 * 2));
}

public void testSomething1()
{
assertTrue(4 == (2 * 2));
}
}

and my build file
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project basedir="." default="run-junit" name="TdsTest">
<property name="test" location="test"/>
<target name="run-junit" description="junit-run" >
<junit printsummary="true" haltonfailure="false">
<formatter type="brief" usefile="true"/>
<batchtest fork="true" todir="${test}">
<fileset dir="${test}"
includes="**/*Test.class"/>
</batchtest>
</junit>
</target>
</project>

and the o/p

estsuite: GopalTest
Tests run: 1, Failures: 0, Errors: 1, Time elapsed: 0 sec

Null Test: Caused an ERROR
GopalTest
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: GopalTest
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:299)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass
(Launcher.java:286)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:255)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal
(ClassLoader.java:315)
at java.lang.Class.forName0(Native Method)
at java.lang.Class.forName(Class.java:120)

what is the reason for it please reply.

thanks
veena
